pair.value: Process used to automatically trigger a welcome message to tempo
="Welcome to the Appian Case Management app"
Post Welcome to CASE_APP on Tempo
Post Welcome to CASE_APP on Tempo

acp.name: Message
acp.a:expr: ="Welcome to the Appian Case Management app! This solution provides a comprehensive case management framework to accelerate your deployment with reusable components and a complete pre-built solution for several use cases including Order Management, Customer Service requests and Investigations." & char(10) & char(10) & "Before you begin, be sure to publish the CASE_APP Data store to your database to create necessary table structures for this solution. More information can be found in the attached deployment instructions. A user guide has also been included."

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Welcome to the Appian Case Management app!  This solution provides a comprehensive case management framework to accelerate your deployment with reusable components and a complete pre-built solution for several use cases including Order Management, Customer Service requests and Investigations.

 

Before you begin, be sure to publish the CASE_APP Data store to your database to create necessary table structures for this solution. More information can be found in the attached deployment instructions. A user guide has also been included.

")
